name: City Eagle Simulator 3D
description:
Fly in the sky and live the life of an eagle! Search for food to survive and explore city blocks as a bird! Meet other eagles to join your flock, fight against city predators – we mean cats and communicate with other animals! Maintain health, hunger and energy rate to set up a flock of eagles with this bird survival simulator in 3D!
Explore the sky above the city streets and blocks like a bird of prey, avoid being a prey yourself and survive at all costs with City Eagle Simulator 3D! Fight against other eagles or recruit them to your flock! Enjoy being a city raptor bird!
City Eagle Simulator 3D features:
Great bird of prey survival simulator
Earn point and raise up your eagle
Fight against other city animals
Explore big city streets, blocks, and roofs
Do you love animal simulators? Try this eagle simulator, spread your wings and fly in the sky! Check City Eagle Simulator 3D and live the life of a city raptor!
